channel.title: Crysis
channel.description:
Okay... I saw this like one or two years ago and thought... it's going to be amazing. Now I find I'm am correct. It comes out in November for the PC and you get a level editor and everything with it.
Trailer: http://www.gametrailers.com/player/23077.html
Demonstration of the editor: Part 1: http://www.gametrailers.com/player/17757.html Part 2: http://www.gametrailers.com/player/17763.html
Other Videos: http://www.gametrailers.com/gamepage.php?id=2509
Personally what interests me most is the level editor, it just gives me a boner thinking about it but atleast I know what I want for Christmas :D.
What do you think about it?

item.title: Crysis
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

And uber graphics with a fully destructible environment. And chickens. Storyline seems a bit crap but gameplay is amazing. MY machine will have to push pretty hard to play this but it’ll be worth it.

Read full topic

item.title: Crysis
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

A cross between Rainbow6 and Halo? With a story line? Interesting.

Read full topic

item.title: Crysis
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

Probably won’t run on my machine, therefore I won’t buy it

I also won’t buy it if it uses Steam or any other DRM programs like that, because I’d like to be able to play it and then sell it at a garage sale or something if I don’t like it.

Read full topic
